item.title: DARWIN, XENON, LUX-ZEPLIN Spring Meeting 2024
item.description: The third joint meeting for the XLZD consortium took place 15-19th of April 2024 at the Rutherford Appleton Laboratory, at Harwell in the UK.

item.title: DARWIN, XENON, LUX-ZEPLIN Spring Meeting 2023
item.description: The second joint meeting after signature of the Memorandum of Understanding has taken place in April 2023 at UCLA.

item.title: DARWIN, XENON, LUX-ZEPLIN Summer Meeting 2022
item.description: The first joint meeting after signature of the MoU has taken place 27-29 June 2022 at KIT (Campus North).

item.title: Signing Memorandum of Understanding
item.description: “XENON, DARWIN and LZ representatives signed a Memorandum of Understanding in July 2021 in which they commit to work together at the next detector, but leave the location open.
